document_data.caption: Elanthra working in the Missing Minotaur.
document_data.name: Elanthra
document_data.mainbody: '''Elanthra''' was a server that worked at the [[Missing Minotaur]] tavern in [[Everlund]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite dragon/293/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Missing Minotaur|75}}
document_data.Description: Elanthra had light skin and long blonde hair.<ref group="note">Based on artist's rendering.
document_data.Relationships: She was a trusted friend of the tavern owner, [[Elsk Thavarask]], and knew that he was a [[Harpers|Harper]] sympathizer. She also knew the code words that patrons could use to arrange a meeting with a [[Harper agent]] or bring immediate armed assistance.
